name: Morne Seychellois Cavern: The Hidden Lock
description: Breathing mountain cave. Bas-relief altar teeth and waves. Five shards placed; five candles unlit. Key entering lock; fragments arranged. Riddle: A door you cannot see still knows its key.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Breathing mountain cave. Bas-relief altar teeth and waves. Five shards placed; five candles unlit. Key entering lock; fragments arranged.. Key props numeric: 5 shards, 5 candles. Cipher letter: L Bearing: 100°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
